backend/main.mo: Main actor defining order management system with types (Order, DesignMapping, Karigar), state variables (orders, designMappings, designImages, karigars, masterDesignKarigars), and functions for saving orders, supplying orders, managing karigars, and design mappings with blob storage integration.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms OldActor state (with Principal-based createdBy/updatedBy fields) to NewActor state (with Text-based fields), converting Principal values to Text and removing the readyOrders and masterDesignMappings maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features for fixing JPEG and PDF export functionality in OrderTable and KarigarDetail components, both referencing frontend/src/utils/exportUtils.ts.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend components including App.tsx with routing, dashboard tabs with filtering/search, order management pages with Excel upload/processing, and design image handling with optimized parallel uploads.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements (background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, borders, sidebar, charts) using oklch color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with UTF-8 charset, viewport meta tag, title 'Jewellery Order Management System', root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with 8 routes (dashboard, ingest-orders, unmapped-codes, master-designs, design-images, tag-printing, barcode-scanning, karigar detail), QueryClient, ThemeProvider, SidebarProvider layout, and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Custom: Tab component displaying only CO type orders with Pending status, featuring search by order number using client-side filtering with useMemo, and rendering results in OrderTable component.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Design: Modal dialog component for viewing design images with zoom and pan functionality, fetches design image data using a custom hook and supports both mouse and touch interactions.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Hallma: Tab component displaying hallmark orders with filters for order type, karigar name, search text, and date range; uses OrderTable to render filtered results.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Kariga: Tab component that groups pending orders by karigar name and displays them as clickable cards showing total orders and weight, navigating to individual karigar detail pages.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/OrderT: Table component for displaying orders with optional bulk selection, mark-as-ready functionality, and export options (Excel, PDF, JPEG); handles design image modal and RB order supply dialogs.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/ReadyT: Tab component displaying orders with Ready status, featuring filters for order type, karigar name, search text, and date range; renders filtered orders using OrderTable.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Summar: Dashboard summary component displaying four metric cards: total orders, total weight, total quantity, and customer orders count with loading states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Suppli: Dialog component for entering supplied quantities for RB orders, supporting single order input or bulk supply of multiple orders at full quantity.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TotalO: Tab component displaying pending and returned orders with filters for order type, karigar, and search; handles marking RB orders as ready with supplied quantity dialog.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Unmapp: Alert banner component that displays unmapped design codes with missing generic or karigar names, providing navigation to unmapped codes and master designs pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppSideba: Collapsible sidebar navigation component with menu items for dashboard, order ingestion, unmapped codes, master designs, design images, tag printing, and barcode scanning.
frontend/src/components/masterdesigns/Ed: Modal dialog for editing design-to-karigar mappings with ability to select existing karigars or add new ones; updates reassign pending orders to the new karigar.
frontend/src/components/tagprinting/Webv: Full-screen modal dialog that embeds an external MPN system URL in an iframe with loading state and sandbox security restrictions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and filtering orders (by status, type, karigar, hallmark), enriching order data with design mappings, and providing bulk status update mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, gold accent colors, sidebar styling, and enhanced interactive states (hover, focus, disabled).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and wraps the App with InternetIdentityProvider and QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BarcodeScanning.tsx: Barcode scanning page supporting both hardware scanners (via keyboard events) and camera-based QR scanning, with bulk order status updates and duplicate detection.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page with tabs for total orders, ready orders, hallmark orders, customer orders, karigars, and an unmapped section, plus summary cards.
frontend/src/pages/DesignImages.tsx: Design image upload page supporting folder and ZIP file uploads, extracting design codes from filenames and batch uploading images to the backend with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/IngestOrders.tsx: Handles bulk order ingestion from Excel files, parsing orders and saving them in batches with progress tracking and error reporting. Validates design mappings exist before saving orders.
frontend/src/pages/KarigarDetail.tsx: Displays detailed view of orders assigned to a specific karigar with export functionality (PDF/JPEG) and ability to mark orders as ready with supplied quantity tracking for RB-type orders.
frontend/src/pages/MasterDesigns.tsx: Manages master design mappings by uploading Excel files containing design codes, generic names, and karigar assignments, then automatically assigns orders to karigars based on these mappings.
frontend/src/pages/TagPrinting.tsx: Provides interface for printing tags for ready orders via MPN system integration, requiring login and showing processing progress for batch operations.
frontend/src/pages/UnmappedCodes.tsx: Lists design codes from orders that lack generic name or karigar assignments, allowing inline editing to manually map unmapped design codes.
frontend/src/utils/excelParser.ts: Parses Excel files for order data and master design data, normalizing design codes to uppercase and trimming whitespace for consistent matching. Includes chunked processing to avoid UI blocking and validation with error reporting.
frontend/src/utils/exportUtils.ts: Provides export functionality to Excel and PDF formats for order data, with PDF export supporting embedded design images fetched from backend, sorted numerically by design code, and optimized for iOS compatibility.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including color schemes using OKLCH color space, typography settings with Inter and Playfair Display fonts, container configurations, and border radius variables.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document indicating known issues with Ready tab order visibility (order 5038CO2600743-001) and JPEG/PDF export functionality, with feature requests to fix these export issues.
